bcid
Class bcid

java.lang.Object
  bcid.GenericIdentifier
      bcid.bcid
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericIdentifierInterface
public class bcid
extends GenericIdentifier

The bcid class encapsulates all of the information we know about a BCID. This includes data such as the status of EZID creation, associated dataset calls, and any metadata. It can include a data element or a data group. There are several ways to construct an element, including creating it from scratch, or instantiating by looking up an existing identifier from the database.
